title: FS - Tris Speaker fountain pen autographed photo PSA
author: skelly423

posts.post_title: FS - Tris Speaker fountain pen autographed photo PSA
posts.post_content:
I'm not sure whether this is the appropriate sub to post this, but it doesn't quite fit anywhere else either.  I'm selling this beautiful signed photo of Tris Speaker.  I don't recognize the photo and don't have many details about its origin -- the back is completely blank.  The photo measures 3" x 4.5", and there is some faint tape residue on the top corners.   The signature is phenomenal, signed with bold blue fountain pen.  

SOLD
Thank you, I've posted it to the correct sub.
